thread.section_title: Element New York Times Square West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fab stay!
thread.title_full: Fab stay! - Review of Element New York Times Square West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: emmajayne2406
title: Fab stay!
text:
Stayed for 4 nights Wednesday 8th March 2017 to Sunday 12th March 2017. Ignore the negative comments, we had a lovely stay here. We had a Deluxe Double Room on the 30th floor and it was brilliant.
All the staff are friendly, welcoming and helpful. Breakfast was great, everything you need (I would recommend going early as opposed to late). The kitchenette in the room was very well equipped and handy. Our room was very clean and serviced by the maids every day. Nice large rooms, safe is free and easy to use. Never experienced an issue with the lifts. Can't fault the hotel, great location, within walking distance of all of Midtown! This hotel was recommended to us by a friend and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it!
